Paper.Title: A computerized dictionary : Le Tresor de la langue francaise informatise

Section.Paragraph: This paper presents one of the main computerized resources of the research Laboratory ATILF (Analyse et traitement informatique de la langue francaise) available via the Web: the computerized dictionary TLFi (Tresor de la langue francaise informatise). Its highly detailed XML structure (over 3,6 million tags) is powered by Stella: the extended capacities and potentialities of this software allows high level queries as well as hypernavigation through and between different databases.
